name: Alea City Two: Artbot Garden
description:
This is my entry for Procjam 2019. Procjam is a yearly game jam in which you make something that makes something. I made a project called Alea City Two: Artbot Garden in which a group of rabbits riding spider robots generate strange modern sculptures in a procedurally generated museum world. It's pretty weird and I had a ton of fun making it. 

It's made in Unity 2019.2 using C# and a bunch of assets from the asset store, including my procedural level generation tool Strata Easy 2D Level Generator, in this case running in 3D mode. This is a little bit of a silly attempt but I think AI generated art, procedural artistry, machine learning, creative coding and computer generated art are really interesting areas that we're going to see a lot of cool stuff in, both inside video games and out. I am also definitely interested in exploring non roguelike games that use PCG, stuff like No Man's Sky is pretty inspiring in this regard. I think PCG and procedural content is only going to get weirder and more interesting as we go :)
